casebody.data:
VERNON BORGMAN v. MATILDA LASSAHN et al [No. 37,

October Term, 1938.]

*696 Decided November 10th, 1938. The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Op-putt, Parke, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ. David Ash, with whom were Charles Jackson and Mark Jackson on the brief, for the appellant. ■ John J. Timantes, Daniel S. Sullivan, and Daniel S. Sullivan, Jr., submitting on brief, for the appellees. Urner, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
